Articles.Content:
Here's my Karley Davidson...

![8RBSY8r.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/8RBSY8r.jpg)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/pHlQ0jxMhDw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Craft file: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/plth8k0kgbhyern/Bike%203.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/plth8k0kgbhyern/Bike%203.craft?dl=0)

Its a two-wheel motorbike. Its quick and stable with SAS on (even better with MJ Rover Stability Control). Powered by an ion engine, which is angled for stability of the bike and this also makes it pretty good in low-gravity.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-22T09:56:28Z" title="02/22/2015 09:56  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 22, 2015</time> by Foxster**

I ![359.png](http://www.serebii.net/xy/pokemon/359.png)![10c-med.jpg](http://www.mateus-lutes.com/image/renaissance/10c-med.jpg)-ly love it!

BTW, you *must* add an optional sidecar.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-22T07:47:35Z" title="02/22/2015 07:47  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 22, 2015</time> by NeatCrown**
